topic.title: 10mb size limit and custom user content
topic.body: Belongs the user content (e.g. topics, comments..) to the general size limit of 10mb? Or is every data/users/* folder a custom site?

6_1QBLGLcgKfcpfLmiDYuDzUKVXFfmTAew55.body: I did it yesterday with a gateway on iOS. But e.g. ZeroTalk is not responsive and did non work very well :/

2_16iYwD5U2fNoS22p6447J7992iL3DHjSHY.body: It is possible to publish new content over tor? (--tor enable/always) Or does it only work with my clear net ip?

21_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf.body:
**Does all connections go through Tor? (zeronet.py --tor enable|always)**
Yes, all traffic go through Tor. If you have a open port (15441), ZeroNet will create a tor hidden service for you.

3_1FzQ2ZsCgLRL4PTqPKtomrzSpKLTuNRXRo.body: It should work. Currently i use Handlebars.js with jQuery and it works very good! Every client-site Framework should work without a problem.
